decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby approved shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith (005FP (rev D), 006FP (rev A), 007FP (rev C), 008FP (rev A), received 24 June 2014) and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby approved shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No additional flank windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the side walls of the extension hereby approved without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a rear and side infill extension to existing dwelling. Replacement of window with french doors and juliet balcony at first floor level.
